name: Typeform Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow on a Typeform form submission
natural_language_description: 这是 Typeform Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow on a Typeform form submission

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

formId.name: formId
formId.description: Form which should trigger workflow on submission. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
formId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Name or ID | 作用: Form which should trigger workflow on submission. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

simplifyAnswers.name: simplifyAnswers
simplifyAnswers.description: Whether to convert the answers to a key:value pair ("FIELD_TITLE":"USER_ANSER") to be easily processable
simplifyAnswers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Answers | 作用: Whether to convert the answers to a key:value pair ("FIELD_TITLE":"USER_ANSER") to be easily processable | 默认值: True

onlyAnswers.name: onlyAnswers
onlyAnswers.description: Whether to return only the answers of the form and not any of the other data
onlyAnswers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Only Answers | 作用: Whether to return only the answers of the form and not any of the other data | 默认值: True
